channel.title: My Text Based Online Game
channel.description:
Ok well it is not finished yet, but I have decided to make a text based game using php. The game is preety basic at the moment, but will become more complex as time goes on.
I do not currently have it hosted right now because I have to wait 60 days until my domain transfers from Microsoft Office Live to GoDaddy. Here are some of the features it contains.
1. Hiscores 2. Fighting Monsters 3. Leveling from 1-300 4. Shopping 5. Going to diffferent areas 6. Skills such as HP, Strength, defence, magic, and hunting (Ranged) 7. Uses MySQL Database 8. Basic Register and Log In Pages 9. Admin Center to manage accounts, banns, etc.
Forums for it will be coming soon. Well thats about it.
I preety much just want to know how good its features look to you. So plaese rate on a scale of 1-10 or 1-5, whichever you like. Thanks for looking :P

item.title: My Text Based Online Game
item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

[quote=“Aftermath, post:19, topic:231270”]Those are all pretty standard features of games, and some of them are only administrative features. You need something to offer that other games don’t, aside from fighting monsters and combat skills, whether it’s in the style, features, or content.
[center] Check the timestamps next time.[/center][/quote]What the fuck, he got warned for that? I’ve seen many retards bump age old topics with nothing of value to the topic and they’ve gotten away without a warning.

UNJUST.

Read full topic

item.title: My Text Based Online Game
item.dc:creator: @Budda Budda
item.description:
@Budda wrote:

[quote=“Aftermath, post:19, topic:231270”]Those are all pretty standard features of games, and some of them are only administrative features. You need something to offer that other games don’t, aside from fighting monsters and combat skills, whether it’s in the style, features, or content.
[center] Check the timestamps next time.[/center][/quote]

Thanks for great input. Helped me on my upcoming game.

Also, notice how his post helped even though its a year later.
Fuck you @ mod who warned.

Read full topic

item.title: My Text Based Online Game
item.dc:creator: @Aftermath_961 Aftermath
item.description:
@Aftermath_961 wrote:

Those are all pretty standard features of games, and some of them are only administrative features. You need something to offer that other games don’t, aside from fighting monsters and combat skills, whether it’s in the style, features, or content.
[center] Check the timestamps next time.[/center]

Read full topic

item.title: My Text Based Online Game
item.dc:creator: @z z
item.description:
@z wrote:

A lot of what you expect to program requires some degree of experience in PHP, depending on how well you want your new RPG structurized. If you aren’t too good at PHP, don’t expect to get far. On the other hand, good luck. I’ve worked on a few RPGs, but I usually got bored with them after some period of time.

Just a note, do a lot of pre-planning if you decide to actually take this onto a serious level.

Read full topic

item.title: My Text Based Online Game
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

[quote=“Xion, post:15, topic:231270”][quote author=N00b1 link=topic=304596.msg2469474#msg2469474 date=1222901199]
hmm wonder how long it will take me to hack it =]

on another note don’t let other people’s views put you down, i made a shitty php game when i was learning it. its a great way of doing it… just being honnest here, don’t expect anyone to play it thou.
[/quote]

It really isn’t going to be a big thing. I am doing this on my spare time for learning purposes. and to all of you who think its gay just because its not as good as rs, wow, or any other online game, I dont give a fucking bull shit. Those games were made by teams of developers who went to college for the shit or have been programming for years upon years. I am only fucking 15 years old, I don’t give a shit what you say or if it is as good as those, so please go fuck yourselves and go watch porn of old men fucking your mothers.[/quote]I didn’t say anything about comparisons in regards to other games.

I said you were an idiot for posting bullshit.

Read full topic
